pullRequest.title: CB-7640: Require non-repaired FreeIPA instance to be available dur...
pullRequest.bodyText:
...ing a repair
When FreeIPA is repaired, the remaining non-repaired instances cannot
be stopped. If the repair operation is not forced then the
non-repaired instances must be available. This validation ensures the
repair operation will not fail from either replicating from a paused
instance or fail to establish cluster proxy links to every instance
that hasn't been repaired.
This was tested with unit tests and on a local deployment of
cloudbreak.
Closes #CB-7640

nodes.bodyText: I think it would help later if we log the instances parameters of this method
maybe a log here and for getRemainingBadInstances would be nice.

commit.message:
CB-7640: Require non-repaired FreeIPA instance to be available dur...
...ing a repair

When FreeIPA is repaired, the remaining non-repaired instances cannot
be stopped. If the repair operation is not forced then the
non-repaired instances must be available. This validation ensures the
repair operation will not fail from either replicating from a paused
instance or fail to establish cluster proxy links to every instance
that hasn't been repaired.

This was tested with unit tests and on a local deployment of
